desc: Michael Major, PGA, has taught thousands of lessons and helped all levels of golfers build, grow and improve their game of golf for over 32 years here at Torrey Pines including the full swing, shortgame, putting, course management and the mental side of the game. Find out why he is a leading San Diego Golf Instructor.

layout.text: Lead Staff Instructor, Torrey Pines Golf Course
Prepare and play Torrey Pines with Michael Major
